title: How to Find All Seven Sages in Pokémon Black and White

steps.title: Sage Ghetsis is the first Sage.
steps.content: Sage Ghetsis is the first Sage. You'll have already defeated him before beginning your quest. After you beat all eight gyms, you'll need to find the remaining six Sages. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Sage Rood can be found at the end of Route 18.
steps.content: Sage Rood can be found at the end of Route 18. Start at Route 1. You'll need to surf across Route 17, and then follow Route 18 to the western point. [2] X Research source Speak to Sage Rood to receive TM32 Double Team .

steps.title: Sage Gorm will be hidden by trees in the Dreamyard.
steps.content: Sage Gorm will be hidden by trees in the Dreamyard. Begin at the Dreamyard, near Striation city. Follow the stairs at the top right to go into the underground area. At the bottom right of the room, there will be a staircase leading up. Take the staircase and head south. Sage Gorm will appear from the trees. [3] X Research source Speak to Sage Gorm to receive TM75 Swords Dance .

steps.title: Sage Ryoku can be found in the Relic Castle.
steps.content: Sage Ryoku can be found in the Relic Castle. Make your way down to the bottom level of the Relic Castle. This is where the NPC Alder was found in the story quest. Continue to the door on the right and battle a Plasma Grunt to find Sage Ryoku. [4] X Research source Speak to Sage Ryoku to receive TM04 Calm Mind .

steps.title: Sage Zinzolin can be found in Cold Storage.
steps.content: Sage Zinzolin can be found in Cold Storage. This is where Team Plasma was hiding during the story quest. [5] X Research source Speak to Sage Zinzolin to receive TM01 Hone Claws .

steps.title: Sage Bronius can be found in Chargestone Cave.
steps.content: Sage Bronius can be found in Chargestone Cave. Enter the cave from its northern entrance from Icirrus City and head down two levels. Continue south to battle two Plasma Grunts and find Sage Bronius. [6] X Research source Make sure to level up your Pokémon and create a balance team to easily defeat enemies. Speak to Sage Bronius to receive TM69 Rock Polish .

steps.title: Sage Giallo can be found on a cliff in Route 14.
steps.content: Sage Giallo can be found on a cliff in Route 14. Head to Route 14 from the southern entrance. Ride the waterfall upstream to find Sage Giallo. [7] X Research source Speak to Sage Giallo to receive HM08 Bulk Up . You will need to find the HM Waterfall to ride the waterfall.
